name: Myriad Mayhem
description:
A Relentless Myriad of Monsters wants you dead

Myriad Mayhem is a challenging top down horde survival game with roguelite mechanics. Where you have to survive and defend your peoples' castle from hordes of monsters.

Create your own builds

For each run, you can strengthen your character or enhance your abilities through their own talent-trees, and as you only can have a few abilities at your disposal, which ability combinations and path in their talent-tree will you take?

Meta Progression

Buy upgrades that will last throughout all runs.
